text.autoconfig.notifmod.title: NotifMod Config
text.autoconfig.notifmod.option.durabili:
Элементы, о которых нужно получать уведомления,
даже если они не зачарованы и не имеют названий.
Разделяйте элементы точкой с запятой, пробелы будут игнорироваться.
Получайте уведомления о любых названных элементах.
Получайте уведомления о любых зачарованных предметах.

Зачарованные предметы, которые следует исключить из вышеуказанной настройки.
Разделяйте элементы точкой с запятой, пробелы будут игнорироваться.

Предметы, которые не исчезают при поломке.
Разделяйте элементы точкой с запятой, пробелы будут игнорироваться.
Durability percentage to get notifications under.

Same as the above, but for items
considered weak, like golden tools.

Items with max damage up to
this, will be considered weak.

Format: sound(pitch); delay; sound(pitch)...
Pitch is a decimal between 0 and 2 (inclusive), with 1 being normal.
For normal pitch, you can omit it and the parentheses.
Delays between sounds are in milliseconds and are NOT optional.
Separate entries with semicolons, spaces will be ignored.

Format: sound(pitch); delay; sound(pitch)...
Pitch is a decimal between 0 and 2 (inclusive), with 1 being normal.
For normal pitch, you can omit it and the parentheses.
Delays between sounds are in milliseconds and are NOT optional.
Separate entries with semicolons, spaces will be ignored.

You'll only get notifications when you mend an item that
has had its durability be lower than this percentage.

Format: sound(pitch); delay; sound(pitch)...
Pitch is a decimal between 0 and 2 (inclusive), with 1 being normal.
For normal pitch, you can omit it and the parentheses.
Delays between sounds are in milliseconds and are NOT optional.
Separate entries with semicolons, spaces will be ignored.
text.autoconfig.notifmod.option.chat.mes:
Запись #1: в фоновом режиме отображаются уведомления о сообщениях и упоминаниях
  работают одинаково, просто используют разные фильтры RegEx
  и упоминания имеют приоритет, если оба совпадают.
Запись #2: существует 3 различных типа сообщений: чат,
  система, информация об игре. Каждый из них имеет отдельный фильтр регулярных выражений.
Запись #3: пустые шаблоны RegEx ничему не будут соответствовать.

You'll only get notifications for messages
matching this regular expression.
Note: \p will be replaced with your username,
before the regular expression gets interpreted.

You'll only get notifications for messages
matching this regular expression.
Note: \p will be replaced with your username,
before the regular expression gets interpreted.

You'll only get notifications for messages
matching this regular expression.
Note: \p will be replaced with your username,
before the regular expression gets interpreted.

The selected filters will distinguish
between lower-case & upper-case.

Format: sound(pitch); delay; sound(pitch)...
Pitch is a decimal between 0 and 2 (inclusive), with 1 being normal.
For normal pitch, you can omit it and the parentheses.
Delays between sounds are in milliseconds and are NOT optional.
Separate entries with semicolons, spaces will be ignored.

text.autoconfig.notifmod.option.chat.Log:
Turn this on, to get info for all incoming
messages, in your console.
This is useful for identifying what
channel (message type) something uses.
text.autoconfig.notifmod.option.playerJo:
Format: sound(pitch); delay; sound(pitch)...
Pitch is a decimal between 0 and 2 (inclusive), with 1 being normal.
For normal pitch, you can omit it and the parentheses.
Delays between sounds are in milliseconds and are NOT optional.
Separate entries with semicolons, spaces will be ignored.

Format: sound(pitch); delay; sound(pitch)...
Pitch is a decimal between 0 and 2 (inclusive), with 1 being normal.
For normal pitch, you can omit it and the parentheses.
Delays between sounds are in milliseconds and are NOT optional.
Separate entries with semicolons, spaces will be ignored.
text.autoconfig.notifmod.option.sleepRem: Это оповестит вас в тот момент, когда вы сможете заснуть.

Pause reminder when in dimensions without
a day/night cycle, like the Nether.

Pause reminder when deep underground (and in a dimension with a
day/night cycle). When enabled, it pauses when you're both below
the minimum altitude and the minimum sky light level at the same time.

Format: sound(pitch); delay; sound(pitch)...
Pitch is a decimal between 0 and 2 (inclusive), with 1 being normal.
For normal pitch, you can omit it and the parentheses.
Delays between sounds are in milliseconds and are NOT optional.
Separate entries with semicolons, spaces will be ignored.
text.autoconfig.notifmod.option.doneLoad:
If true, you'll get the notification after the
main menu's fade in animation ends, otherwise
you'll get it right before the animation starts.

Format: sound(pitch); delay; sound(pitch)...
Pitch is a decimal between 0 and 2 (inclusive), with 1 being normal.
For normal pitch, you can omit it and the parentheses.
Delays between sounds are in milliseconds and are NOT optional.
Separate entries with semicolons, spaces will be ignored.
Уведомления о загрузке по всему миру

You'll get the notification after this many
chunks have rendered. Zero is also valid
and will make it so you get the notification
after you connect successfully to the server.

Format: sound(pitch); delay; sound(pitch)...
Pitch is a decimal between 0 and 2 (inclusive), with 1 being normal.
For normal pitch, you can omit it and the parentheses.
Delays between sounds are in milliseconds and are NOT optional.
Separate entries with semicolons, spaces will be ignored.
text.autoconfig.notifmod.option.reminder:
Instantly starts the timer, skipping the reminder GUI.
The timer will start, using the default value.

Seconds to be notified after.
This is the value that the GUI starts with initially.

Seconds to be notified after.
This is the value set by a preset button in the GUI.

Seconds to be notified after.
This is the value set by a preset button in the GUI.
For the message you get when the timer starts.
For the message you get when the time's up.

Format: sound(pitch); delay; sound(pitch)...
Pitch is a decimal between 0 and 2 (inclusive), with 1 being normal.
For normal pitch, you can omit it and the parentheses.
Delays between sounds are in milliseconds and are NOT optional.
Separate entries with semicolons, spaces will be ignored.
